title: nI tande nA bande
sahitya:
nI tande nA bande nI enna tande 


anupallavi

  manmanadAdhIna pELenna tande


caraNam 1    ondalla eraDalla mUralla nAlgalla embhatta nAlgu lakSa yOnigaLalli nI tande
    caraNam 2    kAmadali ena tande krOdhadali ena tande unmadAbharaNagaLenna tande
    caraNam 3    hinde baredo bareha hOgAdharAgali munde candAgi bareyayya purandara viTTala
